summary: A journalist interviews a sixteen year old boy, who is in police custody after he shot and killed 42 people at his high school.
cast: Norman Reedus|Garrett Backstrom|Martha Higareda|Rob Estes|Sabrina Debler|Andy McPhee|Olivia Faye|Jake White|Alex Neuberger|Lindsay Bushman|Priscilla Herman|Samantha Herman|Arielle Sitrick|Jordan White|Alec George|Jonathan Grubb|Tim Zhang|Franco Carlotto|Christina Stanley|Rebecca Morgan|Brian Drillinger|Alan Pietruszewski|Christine Dunford|Alexandra Guarnieri|John Bobek|Holly Bonelli|Paul Tirado|Benjamin Statler|Melanie Coote|Renee Taglia|Jacqueline King|David Castellvi|Juliana Penner|Dominic Bogart|Chris Bonanno|Jerry Katell|Dan Jenks|Tassa Loncarevic|David Burrus|Elias McCabe|F.R. Noriega|Max Sebrechts|Gustavo Gallego|Paul Buxton|Mike Guirgis|Susanna Brisk|Max Acosta-Rubio|Shayne Anderson|Benjamin Chamberlain|Carly Coutts|Mars Crain|Michelle Danner|James Deloy Scott|Joshua Fishbein|Holly Fowler|Paul Anthony Gutierrez|Justin Harris|Ginger Hart|Nick Meyers|Jonathan Oldham|Lisa Papatzimas|Chris Roche|Curt Sletten|Kelsey Smoot|Sarah Stettler|Nina Vincent|Justine White|Porter Wiley|Libertad Green|William Mortensen Vaughan|Johan Wester
title: Hello Herman
